scripts.build:haxe: concurrent "npm run build:haxe-kurento" "npm run build:haxe-native" "npm run build:haxe-web"
scripts.watch:haxe: concurrent "npm run watch:haxe-kurento" "npm run watch:haxe-native" "npm run watch:haxe-web"
scripts.watch:web: concurrent "npm run watch:haxe-web" "npm run watch:css-web" "npm run watch:server-web"

scripts.release:native-win: npm run release:build-native && npm run release:pack-win && npm run release:installer-win
scripts.release:web: concurrent "npm run release:haxe-web" "npm run release:css-web" && npm run release:copy-web
